column4: hey guys im geting this error wehn im trying to mount my drive Mount: Cant Find Media/UsbDisk in /etc/fstab or etc/mtab

is there anyway u can speed up an ext3 filesystem?
is there any free graphical rar archive programs for unbuntu
yes.
type in "sudo apt-get install unrar-free" into a terminal. Once it's done, double click on any .rar file.
yes.
yeah. (personally, i'd use .7z. higher compression rate.)
It should be in there as "archive manager". If not, type "file-roller" into a terminal.
ok, type "sudo apt-get install file-roller" into a terminal.
then THAT should work.
a terminal?
It's the native archive manager for GNOME.
What did you get when you typed in "sudo apt-get install unrar-free"?
OK... try "sudo apt-get install unrar".
It enables a set of files, so that file-roller supports the file type.
In a terminal, launch "alacarte". It's the menu editor for GNOME.
